about_the_game:
Secret of the Magic Crystals: Dress Up - is a customisation expansion for the original game which allows you to dress your horses in various outfits. Hundreds of items and millions of combinations are possible!.

Dress up all your horses in style! Participate in a multiplayer race* against your friends to show off your horse outfit!

*multiplayer races require 'The Race' DLC purchase

Main features:
  • 6 different areas to dress (head/eyes/back/bottom/tail/legs)
  • 10+ items in each category
  • 6 different colour variations for many items
  • millions of combinations
  • outfits gets carried over to all activities, including multiplayer races
